citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:00 PM on
07/28/2015.
Left message on the licensees cell phone that I was at the facility. Placed business card on door. Text message
from licensee when I returned to the car stated she was at work and would not be home until late. I texted back to
please give me her days and hours of availability. The licensee texted dates and times back.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:00 PM on
07/28/2015.
Left message on the licensees cell phone that I was at the facility.  Placed business card on door.  Text message
from licensee when I returned to the car stated she was at work and would not be home until late.  I texted back to
please give me her days and hours of availability.  The licensee texted dates and times back.
